display_html:
data CostModelApplyError
  • = CMUnknownParamError !Text
  • | CMInternalReadError
  • | CMInternalWriteError !String
  • | CMTooFewParamsError {
    • cmTooFewExpected :: !Int
    • cmTooFewActual :: !Int
    }
name: CostModelApplyError CMUnknownParamError CMInternalReadError CMInternalWriteError CMTooFewParamsError cmTooFewExpected cmTooFewActual

display_html:
data ScriptPurpose
  • = Minting CurrencySymbol
  • | Spending TxOutRef
  • | Rewarding StakingCredential
  • | Certifying DCert
name: ScriptPurpose Minting Spending Rewarding Certifying

display_html:
data DCert
  • = DCertDelegRegKey StakingCredential
  • | DCertDelegDeRegKey StakingCredential
  • | DCertDelegDelegate StakingCredential PubKeyHash
  • | DCertPoolRegister PubKeyHash PubKeyHash
  • | DCertPoolRetire PubKeyHash Integer
  • | DCertGenesis
  • | DCertMir
name: DCert DCertDelegRegKey DCertDelegDeRegKey DCertDelegDelegate DCertPoolRegister DCertPoolRetire DCertGenesis DCertMir

display_html:
data StakingCredential
  • = StakingHash Credential
  • | StakingPtr Integer Integer Integer
name: StakingCredential StakingHash StakingPtr

display_html:
newtype Value = Value {
  • getValue :: Map CurrencySymbol (Map TokenName Integer)
}
name: Value Value getValue

display_html: unionWith :: (Integer -> Integer -> Integer) -> Value -> Value -> Value
name: unionWith

display_html:
newtype POSIXTime = POSIXTime {
  • getPOSIXTime :: Integer
}
name: POSIXTime POSIXTime getPOSIXTime

display_html:
data TxInfo = TxInfo {
  • txInfoInputs :: [TxInInfo]
  • txInfoReferenceInputs :: [TxInInfo]
  • txInfoOutputs :: [TxOut]
  • txInfoFee :: Value
  • txInfoMint :: Value
  • txInfoDCert :: [DCert]
  • txInfoWdrl :: Map StakingCredential Integer
  • txInfoValidRange :: POSIXTimeRange
  • txInfoSignatories :: [PubKeyHash]
  • txInfoRedeemers :: Map ScriptPurpose Redeemer
  • txInfoData :: Map DatumHash Datum
  • txInfoId :: TxId
}
name: TxInfo TxInfo txInfoInputs txInfoOutputs txInfoFee txInfoMint txInfoDCert txInfoWdrl txInfoValidRange txInfoSignatories txInfoData txInfoId txInfoReferenceInputs txInfoRedeemers

display_html:
data TxOut = TxOut {
  • txOutAddress :: Address
  • txOutValue :: Value
  • txOutDatum :: OutputDatum
  • txOutReferenceScript :: Maybe ScriptHash
}
name: TxOut TxOut txOutDatum txOutAddress txOutValue txOutReferenceScript

display_html:
data TxOutRef = TxOutRef {
  • txOutRefId :: TxId
  • txOutRefIdx :: Integer
}
name: TxOutRef TxOutRef txOutRefId txOutRefIdx

display_html:
data TxInInfo = TxInInfo {
  • txInInfoOutRef :: TxOutRef
  • txInInfoResolved :: TxOut
}
name: TxInInfo TxInInfo txInInfoOutRef txInInfoResolved

display_html:
data Interval a = Interval {
  • ivFrom :: LowerBound a
  • ivTo :: UpperBound a
}
name: Interval Interval ivFrom ivTo

display_html:
data Extended a
  • = NegInf
  • | Finite a
  • | PosInf
name: Extended Finite NegInf PosInf

display_html: data UpperBound a = UpperBound (Extended a) Closure
name: UpperBound UpperBound

display_html: data LowerBound a = LowerBound (Extended a) Closure
name: LowerBound LowerBound

display_html: fromList :: [(k, v)] -> Map k v
name: fromList

display_html:
data Data
  • = Constr Integer [Data]
  • | Map [(Data, Data)]
  • | List [Data]
  • | I Integer
  • | B ByteString
name: Data B Map List I Constr

display_html:
class ToData a where
  • toBuiltinData :: a -> BuiltinData
name: ToData toBuiltinData

display_html:
class FromData a where
  • fromBuiltinData :: BuiltinData -> Maybe a
name: FromData fromBuiltinData

display_html: toData :: ToData a => a -> Data
name: toData

display_html: fromData :: FromData a => Data -> Maybe a
name: fromData

data EvaluationError
  • = CekError !(CekEvaluationException NamedDeBruijn DefaultUni DefaultFun)
  • | DeBruijnError !FreeVariableError
  • | CodecError !ScriptDecodeError
  • | IncompatibleVersionError !Version
  • | CostModelParameterMismatch
name: EvaluationError CekError DeBruijnError CodecError IncompatibleVersionError CostModelParameterMismatch
